articles.author: Lauren Forristal
articles.title: Netflix is letting users play games on their TV screens - TechCrunch
articles.description: Alongside the announcement, Netflix revealed the new slate of games it’s launching, all of which are party titles meant to be played in groups.
articles.content: Starting this week, Netflix subscribers can play games on their smart TV — a feature that has been in the works for some time. Reports about Netflix’s efforts to bring its mobile games to televisions… [+1884 chars]
